name: Super Ping Pong
description:
A UNIQUE WAY OF PLAYING PING PONG.


FEATURING 4 GAME MODES;

- CLASSIC : A classic game play, two sticks one ball.

- SUPER : PowerUps to freeze the opponent's paddle and speed up the ball.

- PINGPONG : A unique way playing pinpong. Swipe the paddle to hit the ball fast.
